mapper.insert: insert into cart_table (memberId, productId, cartProduct, cartName, cartAmount, cartPrice) values (#{memberId}, #{productId}, #{cartProduct}, #{cartName}, #{cartAmount}, #{cartPrice})
mapper.select: select * from cart_table where memberId=#{memberId} and productId=#{productId}
mapper.update: update cart_table set cartAmount=cartAmount+1 where memberId=#{memberId} and productId=#{productId}
